title: Happy new year from balena!
text: Welcome to the new year! It’s 2019 and we still don’t have flying cars or hoverboards (no, those don’t count 🚀). Nevertheless, 2018 saw some noteworthy and groundbreaking milestones for our own company, from the launch of multicontainer to the balenaFin to renaming the company. We’re not showing any signs of slowing down and have some awesome projects in the pipeline that we can’t wait to show you throughout the coming year.
